General.Name: Coro Energy PLC
General.Description: Coro Energy plc engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas in South East Asia. Its asset portfolio is situated in the west Natuna basin, offshore Indonesia. Coro Energy plc was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Leeds, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Park Row, Leeds, United Kingdom, LS1 5AB

1.Name: Mr. Mark  Hood
1.Title: Country Chairman of Philippines & Non-Exec. Director
